org.gridgain.grover.categories
[Groovy] Class GroverProjectionCategory

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grover.categories.GroverProjectionCategory

@Typed
class GroverProjectionCategory

Extensions for GridProjection.

To access methods from the category target class has to be annotated: @Use(GroverProjectionCategory).

Authors:
2005-2011 Copyright © GridGain Systems, Inc.
Version:
GridGain 3.5 build: 02092011

Method Detail

call$

static Collection call$(GridProjection p, GridClosureCallMode mode, @Nullable GridOutClosure c, @Nullable GridPredicate f)
Synchronous closure call on this projection with return value. This call will block until all results are received and ready.
Parameters:
mode - Closure call mode.
s - Optional closure to call. If null - this method is no-op and returns null.
p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.
Returns:
Sequence of result values from all nodes where given closures were executed or null (see above).

Parameters:

p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.
Returns:
Sequence of result values from all nodes where given closures were executed or null (see above).

callSafe

static Collection callSafe(GridProjection p, GridClosureCallMode mode, @Nullable GridOutClosure c, Callable dflt, @Nullable GridPredicate f)
Synchronous closures call on this projection with return value. This call will block until all results are received and ready. If this projection is empty than dflt closure will be executed and its result returned.
Parameters:
mode - Closure call mode.
s - Optional sequence of closures to call. If empty or null - this method is no-op and returns null.
dflt - Closure to execute if projection is empty.
p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.
Returns:
Sequence of result values from all nodes where given closures were executed or null (see above).

mapreduce$

static R2 mapreduce$(GridProjection p, GroverMapper m, @Nullable Collection c, @Nullable GroverReducer r, @Nullable GridPredicate f)
Synchronous closures execution on this projection with mapping and reduction. This call will block until all results are reduced.
Parameters:
m - Mapping function.
s - Optional sequence of closures to call. If empty or null - this method is no-op and will return null.
r - Optional reduction function. If null - this method is no-op and will return null.
p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.
Returns:
Reduced result or null (see above).

mapreduceAsync$

static GridFuture mapreduceAsync$(GridProjection p, GroverMapper m, @Nullable Collection c, @Nullable GroverReducer r, @Nullable GridPredicate f)
Asynchronous closures execution on this projection with mapping and reduction. This call will return immediately with the future that can be used to wait asynchronously for the results.
Parameters:
m - Mapping function.
s - Optional sequence of closures to call. If empty or null - this method is no-op and will return null.
r - Optional reduction function. If null - this method is no-op and will return null.
p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.
Returns:
Future over the reduced result or null (see above).

mapreduceSafe

static R2 mapreduceSafe(GridProjection p, GroverMapper m, @Nullable Collection c, @Nullable GroverReducer r, Callable dflt, @Nullable GridPredicate f)
Synchronous closures execution on this projection with mapping and reduction. This call will block until all results are reduced. If this projection is empty than dflt closure will be executed and its result returned.
Parameters:
m - Mapping function.
s - Optional sequence of closures to call. If empty or null - this method is no-op and will return null.
r - Optional reduction function. If null - this method is no-op and will return null.
dflt - Closure to execute if projection is empty.
p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.
Returns:
Reduced result or null (see above).

reduce$

static R2 reduce$(GridProjection p, GridClosureCallMode mode, @Nullable Collection c, @Nullable GroverReducer r, @Nullable GridPredicate f)
Synchronous closures execution on this projection with reduction. This call will block until all results are reduced.
Parameters:
mode - Closure call mode.
s - Optional sequence of closures to call. If empty or null - this method is no-op and will return null.
r - Optional reduction function. If null - this method is no-op and will return null.
p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.
Returns:
Reduced result or null (see above).

reduceAsync$

static GridFuture reduceAsync$(GridProjection p, GridClosureCallMode mode, @Nullable Collection c, @Nullable GroverReducer r, @Nullable GridPredicate f)
Asynchronous closures execution on this projection with reduction. This call will return immediately with the future that can be used to wait asynchronously for the results.
Parameters:
mode - Closure call mode.
s - Optional sequence of closures to call. If empty or null - this method is no-op and will return finished future over null.
r - Optional reduction function. If null - this method is no-op and will return finished future over null.
p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.
Returns:
Future over the reduced result or null (see above).

reduceSafe

static R2 reduceSafe(GridProjection p, GridClosureCallMode mode, @Nullable Collection c, @Nullable GroverReducer r, Callable dflt, @Nullable GridPredicate f)
Synchronous closures execution on this projection with reduction. This call will block until all results are reduced. If this projection is empty than dflt closure will be executed and its result returned.
Parameters:
mode - Closure call mode.
s - Optional sequence of closures to call. If empty or null - this method is no-op and will return null.
r - Optional reduction function. If null - this method is no-op and will return null.
dflt - Closure to execute if projection is empty.
p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.
Returns:
Reduced result or null (see above).

runSafe

static void runSafe(GridProjection p, GridClosureCallMode mode, @Nullable GridAbsClosure c, Runnable dflt, @Nullable GridPredicate f)
Synchronous closure call on this projection without return value. This call will block until all executions are complete. If this projection is empty than dflt closure will be executed.
Parameters:
mode - Closure call mode.
s - Optional closure to call. If empty or null - this method is no-op.
dflt - Closure to execute if projection is empty.
p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.

runSafe

static void runSafe(GridProjection p, GridClosureCallMode mode, @Nullable Collection c, Runnable dflt, @Nullable GridPredicate f)
Synchronous closures call on this projection without return value. This call will block until all executions are complete. If this projection is empty than dflt closure will be executed.
Parameters:
mode - Closure call mode.
s - Optional sequence of closures to call. If empty or null - this method is no-op.
p - Optional node filter predicate. If none provided or null - all nodes in projection will be used.
dflt - Closure to execute if projection is empty.
